verses.text: \w Deliver|strong="H7971"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w* \w from|strong="H7971"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* enemies, \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w God|strong="H7971"\w*. \w Set|strong="H7971"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w* \w on|strong="H5329"\w* high \w from|strong="H7971"\w* those \w who|strong="H8104"\w* rise \w up|strong="H7971"\w* \w against|strong="H7971"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w*.

\w Deliver|strong="H5337"\w* \w me|strong="H5337"\w* \w from|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H6965"\w* workers \w of|strong="H6965"\w* iniquity. \w Save|strong="H5337"\w* \w me|strong="H5337"\w* \w from|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H6965"\w* bloodthirsty men.

For, behold, they lie \w in|strong="H1818"\w* wait for \w my|strong="H5337"\w* soul. \w The|strong="H3467"\w* mighty gather themselves together against \w me|strong="H3467"\w*, \w not|strong="H3467"\w* for \w my|strong="H5337"\w* disobedience, nor for \w my|strong="H5337"\w* sin, \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* done \w no|strong="H3808"\w* wrong, \w yet|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H6588"\w* ready \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w attack|strong="H1481"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w*. Rise \w up|strong="H5921"\w*, \w behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* help \w me|strong="H5315"\w*!

\w You|strong="H7200"\w*, \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* God \w of|strong="H5771"\w* Armies, \w the|strong="H7200"\w* God \w of|strong="H5771"\w* Israel, \w rouse|strong="H5782"\w* \w yourself|strong="H5782"\w* \w to|strong="H7200"\w* punish \w the|strong="H7200"\w* nations. \w Show|strong="H7200"\w* \w no|strong="H1097"\w* mercy \w to|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* wicked traitors. \qs Selah.\qs*
\w They|strong="H3068"\w* return \w at|strong="H3478"\w* evening, howling \w like|strong="H3478"\w* dogs, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* prowl around \w the|strong="H3605"\w* city.

Behold, \w they|strong="H5892"\w* spew \w with|strong="H5892"\w* \w their|strong="H7725"\w* mouth. Swords \w are|strong="H5892"\w* \w in|strong="H5892"\w* \w their|strong="H7725"\w* lips, “\w For|strong="H5892"\w*”, \w they|strong="H5892"\w* \w say|strong="H7725"\w*, “who hears \w us|strong="H7725"\w*?”

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, laugh at \w them|strong="H8085"\w*. \w You|strong="H3588"\w* scoff at \w all|strong="H2009"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* nations.

Oh, \w my|strong="H3605"\w* Strength, \w I|strong="H3068"\w* watch \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*, \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w high|strong="H1471"\w* tower.

\w My|strong="H8104"\w* God \w will|strong="H5797"\w* go before \w me|strong="H8104"\w* \w with|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H8104"\w* loving kindness. God \w will|strong="H5797"\w* let \w me|strong="H8104"\w* look at \w my|strong="H8104"\w* enemies \w in|strong="H4869"\w* triumph.

Don’t kill \w them|strong="H7200"\w*, \w or|strong="H7200"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* \w people|strong="H7200"\w* may forget. Scatter \w them|strong="H7200"\w* \w by|strong="H7200"\w* \w your|strong="H7200"\w* power, \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w bring|strong="H6923"\w* \w them|strong="H7200"\w* down, \w Lord|strong="H2617"\w* \w our|strong="H7200"\w* shield.

\w For|strong="H2428"\w* \w the|strong="H7911"\w* sin \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w their|strong="H2026"\w* mouth, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H7911"\w* words \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w their|strong="H2026"\w* lips, \w let|strong="H3381"\w* \w them|strong="H3381"\w* \w be|strong="H5971"\w* caught \w in|strong="H5971"\w* \w their|strong="H2026"\w* pride, \w for|strong="H2428"\w* \w the|strong="H7911"\w* curses \w and|strong="H5971"\w* lies \w which|strong="H5971"\w* \w they|strong="H5971"\w* utter.

Consume \w them|strong="H1697"\w* \w in|strong="H1697"\w* wrath. Consume \w them|strong="H1697"\w*, \w and|strong="H1697"\w* \w they|strong="H6310"\w* \w will|strong="H1697"\w* \w be|strong="H1697"\w* \w no|strong="H6310"\w* more. Let \w them|strong="H1697"\w* know \w that|strong="H1697"\w* God rules \w in|strong="H1697"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H5608"\w*, \w to|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* ends \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* earth. \qs Selah.\qs*

\w At|strong="H3045"\w* evening let \w them|strong="H3615"\w* return. Let \w them|strong="H3615"\w* howl \w like|strong="H2534"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* dog, \w and|strong="H3045"\w* \w go|strong="H2534"\w* around \w the|strong="H3588"\w* city.

\w They|strong="H5892"\w* \w shall|strong="H5892"\w* wander \w up|strong="H7725"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w down|strong="H5437"\w* \w for|strong="H5892"\w* food, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* wait \w all|strong="H7725"\w* \w night|strong="H6153"\w* if \w they|strong="H5892"\w* aren’t satisfied.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* sing \w of|strong="H7646"\w* \w your|strong="H3808"\w* strength. Yes, \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* sing aloud \w of|strong="H7646"\w* \w your|strong="H3808"\w* loving kindness \w in|strong="H3885"\w* \w the|strong="H3885"\w* morning. \w For|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H7646"\w* \w been|strong="H3808"\w* \w my|strong="H3808"\w* high tower, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* refuge \w in|strong="H3885"\w* \w the|strong="H3885"\w* day \w of|strong="H7646"\w* \w my|strong="H3808"\w* distress.

\w To|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w strength|strong="H5797"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w sing|strong="H7891"\w* praises. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* God \w is|strong="H2617"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* high \w tower|strong="H4869"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* God \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w*.
